a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Average learning outcomes vs total government expenditure on education,
Average learning outcomes correspond to test scores across standardized, psychometrically-robust international and regional
Source: Patrinos and Angrist (2018) and UNESCO Institute of Statistics via World Bank (2023)
Note: Government expenditure data is expressed in international-$ at 2019 prices.
